desc: Hi my name is Chris and I am a running coach. I want to develop an app my athletes can use to execute and record their interval training sessions. I would like to be able to design sessions and send them to them for them to follow. For example one of my athletes interval sessions may be to run fast for 1 minute then run slow for 200m, fast for 500m and then slow for 2 minutes and to repeat this set 3 times, or another set example may be to run 200m fast and rest for 1 minute then run 400m fast and rest for 2 minutes and repeat this set 7 times. I need the app to tell the runner when to stop and when to start. I would like the app to record speed (km an hour, minutes a km), time (moving and stationary), distance, GPS map, elevation, cadence (steps per minute), splits, heart rate (integrate device options), calories, time activity started and finished. GPX file for route. I would like to be able to create complicated interval sessions and send/give them to my athletes so when they run the interval session all they have to do is start and stop running when their app tells them too. I would like the display to show the activity breakdown so they know what will be coming next for the rest of the interval session.
title: build an app
